tit.e: Ippo MISHOSAI (a Japanese expert of flower arrangement)
Ippo MISHOSAI (a Japanese expert of flower arrangement)
tit.cmt: 人名のため、説明を削除しました。

sen.j: 未生斎一甫（みしょうさい いっぽ、宝暦11年（1761年） - 文政7年（1824年））は、日本の華道家。
sen.e: "Ippo MISHOSAI" (1761 - 1824) was a Japanese flower arrangement expert.
"Ippo MISHOSAI" (1761 - 1824) was a Japanese flower arrangement expert.
Ippo MISHOSAI (1761 - 1824) was a Japanese flower arrangement expert.
sen.cmt: ダブルクォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.e: He was the first head (founder) of Misho-ryu school.
He was the first head (founder) of Misho-ryu school.
He was the first head (founder) of Misho school.
His real name was Sanseki YAMAMURA.
